title: Pet Society (Playfish game) Font
content:
Hello I'm looking for this font ID.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100521113338im_/http:/typophile.com/files/trophies_5442.png)

In the Pet Society homepage you can also find the font:

[http://www.petsociety.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100521113338/http:/www.petsociety.com/ "http://www.petsociety.com/")

Thank you
author: punkpanter

comments.content: Zero kerning, bad spacing. Have you looked at dafont?

Yes, I just did.  
I couldn't find it either.

Thank you for the tip ;)
